metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3161 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the Framebuffer Console (fbcon) in the Linux Kernel.When providing font->width and font->height greater than 32 tofbcon_set_font, since there are no checks in place, a shift-out-of-boundsoccurs leading to undefined behavior and possible denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-72-generic - 5.15.0-72.79
linux-image-5.15.0-72-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-72.79
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-72-generic - 5.15.0-72.79
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-72-generic-64k - 5.15.0-72.79
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-42-generic - 5.19.0-42.43~22.04.1
linux-image-5.19.0-42-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-42.43~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-42-generic - 5.19.0-42.43~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-42-generic-64k - 5.19.0-42.43~22.04.1
No subscription required
